text: The New Progressive Party is a Puerto Rican left-wing political party. Founded in 2019, the party quickly rose to become one of Puerto Rico's most popular political movements. The party, often referred to as the “Green Donkey” party, focuses on several key issues including women's health, affordable housing, and healthcare for all. Category:Puerto Rico Category:Political parties in the United States Category:Establishments in Puerto Rico Category:2019 establishments in the United States
title: New Progressive Party (Puerto Rico)
